name: SKYNETRA 2026 - Drone Innovation Expo
description: ??? Explore cutting-edge drone technology, witness thrilling live demonstrations, and get hands-on experience with innovative drone systems at SKYNETRA, where creativity meets technology! rules: Team Size: 2-4 members (Duo, Trio or Squad)
